tree.text: It's a large rune, with something enscribed upon it...

tree.speaker: Rune
tree.text: "For years I have been a victim, torn by war between Ruirui and Lucosa. No longer will I stand for this ceaseless violence."

tree.speaker: Rune
tree.text: "Peace has been promised, but as with every attempt before, discontent boils beneath the surface."

tree.speaker: Rune
tree.text: "I have lived a long life, and it saddens me knowing that I can't fix this world. However, even if I can't see it, I will try my best to help."
